...

attachments.displayName:
The Dunes



The sun

dips below the sleak sky above

and bathes in the cool waters

it's lambency

stretches out to

touch the beaches

overlooked by the crooked

fence posts

buffeted and worn

by the sands of time

the clouds lay the covers onto

the simplistic serenity

that shrouds the dunes

in the white summer

bracing for the Autumn

that has yet to come.


Credit to a local artist who works in her own art gallery in holland michigan, Kate Moynihan, for this serenely beautiful painting, through it I found inspiration. I worked hard to compliment it, and she liked it enough for it to be presented by the painting itself.

object.content:
The Dunes



The sun

  dips below the sleak sky above

  and bathes in the cool waters

it's lambency

  stretches out to    
                   
  touch the beaches

overlooked by the crooked

fence posts

 buffeted and worn

  by the sands of time

the clouds lay the covers onto

the simplistic serenity

that shrouds the dunes

in the white summer

bracing for the Autumn

that has yet to come.


Credit to a local artist who works in her own art gallery in holland michigan, Kate Moynihan, for this serenely beautiful painting, through it I found inspiration. I worked hard to compliment it, and she liked it enough for it to be presented by the painting itself.
